ca.ualberta.cs.corgFuModels

Class AllQuestions

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.corgFu.Model<IView>
      • ca.ualberta.cs.corgFuModels.AllQuestions

  • public class AllQuestions
extends Model<IView>
    The model that holds all of the currently available questions that will be modified by an AllQuestionsController. The contents of the model will depend on Internet connectivity. If there is Internet connectivity and the app is active, the model will contain all available questions, from all other users, since the model was last updated. If there is no Internet connectivity, the model will contain all questions that have been made available offline through one of three methods.

    1) Open the question for viewing

    2) Set question as a favourite

    3) Choose the Read Later option when viewing the question.

    Author:
    wrflemin
